thread.title: GE Manufactures a Higher Rating
thread.title_full: GE Manufactures a Higher Rating - WSJ

author: Spencer Jakab
title: GE Manufactures a Higher Rating
text:
“Indugital” sounds about as clunky as “findustrial,” but it will be a lot less awkward for General Electric Co.
That first portmanteau is being used in advertisements for the company that, until recently, got the lion’s share of profit from shuffling around pieces of financial paper.
GE wants people, and especially investors, to know that there are really two radical transformations going on at the iconic company. The one that...
